title: How to Connect to the Internet Wirelessly in Windows 7

steps.title: This is located in the notification area.
steps.content: This is located in the notification area. The notification area is usually at the bottom-right corner of your screen on the taskbar.

steps.title: Click the name of a wireless network.
steps.content: Click the name of a wireless network. All of the networks in-range will appear here.

steps.title: This connects you to the network.
steps.content: This connects you to the network. If a password is not required to join, you'll be connected instantly.

steps.title: Type the Wi-Fi password to connect.
steps.content: Type the Wi-Fi password to connect. Some networks allow you to connect by pressing a button on the router. If this is the case, a message explaining this will show in the connection box.

steps.title: Once you enter the password or press the router button, click OK to connect.
steps.content: Once you enter the password or press the router button, click OK to connect. Once you're connected, you can browse the web.
